name: WoW Armory Discord Bot
description: Discord bot which displays notable PVE/PVP achievements and progress.

WOW_CLIENT_ID.description: Required to make calls to the Blizzard API key, you can sign up for a client id here: https://dev.battle.net/

WOW_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Required to make calls to the Blizzard API key, you can sign up for a client secret here: https://dev.battle.net/

WOW_REGION.description: The server region you'd like to query, for example `us`, or `eu`.

LOCALE.description: The language for your selected WoW region, for example `en_US`, or `en_GB`. Locale depends on region, please refer to the Blizzard API documents (https://dev.battle.net/) for more information. At this time this bot will only return data in English.

DISCORD_BOT_TOKEN.description: The token for your Discord bot user, you can sign up for one here: https://discordapp.com/developers/docs/intro
